channel.title: Anonymous
channel.description:
Who exactly are they? I know they're some computer people that do computer stuff on 4chan and /b/.
The reason I wanna know is because some weird kid that went to my old school is being butt fucked by them. They found out where he lived in like 2 hours, and send pizza deliveries and magazine subscriptions to his house and call him all the time. I think it's pretty funny honestly.
Heres the kid: http://www.youtube.com/user/PBDCProductions
They made him apologize with a shoe on his head and stuff. Now they want him to wear a wedding gown and truffle shuffle.

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Pzezima2:

Yeah but I don’t get it. Someone tell me

en.wikipedia.org

Anonymous (group)

Anonymous is a decentralized international hacktivist group that is widely known for its various DDOS cyber attacks against several governments, government institutions & government agencies, corporations, and the Church of Scientology. Anonymous originated in 2003 on the imageboard 4chan, representing the concept of many online and offline community users simultaneously existing as an anarchic, digitized global brain. Anonymous members (known as "Anons") can be distinguished in public by the wea...

YouTube porn day On May 20, 2009, members of Anonymous uploaded numerous pornographic videos onto YouTube.[68] Many of these videos were disguised as children's videos or family friendly videos with tags such as "Jonas brothers."[68] YouTube has since removed all videos uploaded. The BBC contacted one of the uploaders who stated that it was a "4chan raid" organized due to the removal of music videos from YouTube.[69] BBC News reported that one victim posted a comment saying: "I'm 12 years old and what is this?"[69] which went on to become an internet meme.
I remember this, epic trolls.

I would like to point out (I don’t use PS3 nor Xbox) but the Xbox was hacked way before PS3.

events.ccc.de

1780_27c3_console_hacking_2010.pdf


It had taken them 4 years to hack the player station, while the JTAG hack was released in the first four months.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:30, topic:392457”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=489628.msg3579716#msg3579716 date=1303695232]
Simply put - Anonymous are people who have over 9000 emails, uses names like anon9001, and proceed to provide “memes” that only include people who visit the /b/ board of 4chan regularly. Anonymous isn’t just one person but a group of people who band together to harass people for fun. Benefits include memberships to pornography websites and other things should you “deliver” for anonymous in a way which begins to destroy your brain cells the moment you’re infected.

tl;dr - faggots.
[/quote]
I guessed you’d be in here moaning about 4chan… Nothing ever changes. Seriously, you need to chill out about them.

And - They basically want to make life a living hell for anyone at anytime at any place whenever possible. It also makes them mad when someone doesn’t like them like this guy:

Epic Steve (+26/-200) LilXCj (+10/-200) -1 STOP FUCKING MOANING EVERYTIME SOMEONE MENTIONS /B/ In topic April 05, 2011, 09:15:29 AM

I don’t care that you don’t like them. You just have to shut the fuck up moaning every time somone mentions them. Even in a joke you fucking cry about it.

ps; We can all mention rep…
[table][tr][td][center]LilXCj (+10/-200)[/center][/td] [td][center]Epic Steve (+26/-200)[/center][/td] [td][center]-1[/center][/td] [td][center]Really, gtfo.[/center][/td][td][center]In topic[/center][/td] [td][center]March 23, 2011, 11:05:53 PM[/center][/td][/tr][/table](For mentioning Rules 1 and 2… Lul’d).[/quote]

Don’t get me wrong. I like the anime boards of 4chan. However /b/society can go rot for all I care.

Read full topic
